scripts.clean:tests: shx rm -rf dist/**/* && shx rm -rf test-es5/**/* && true
scripts.test: npm run build:tests && mocha test-es5/**/*.js --require babel-polyfill
scripts.coverage: npm run clean:tests && npm run build:tests && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test-es5/**/*.js
scripts.build:tests: babel src -d dist && babel test -d test-es5
scripts.build:docs: npm run clean:docs && jsdoc src -r -d docs
scripts.update:version: npm version patch --force && npm run build:readme
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run test
